name: Gamification OS
description: Turn your digital workspace into an enjoyable game.Transform your work routine into a fun and rewarding experience in Notion.Are you tired of boring, mundane tasks at work?Introducing my Gamification OS in Notion! With this system, you can turn mundane tasks into exciting challenges and competitions.Imagine earning rewards and recognition for completing tasks you already do every day. Imagine the satisfaction of beating your coworkers in a friendly competition.Sign up now to start using our gami
features: Gamified Tasks; Gamified Journal; Pets (Pokemon); Gamification Tags; Engaged teams; Gamification enthusiasts; Anyone looking to gamify their life and/or business; Totally! Just duplicate the theme from the link after your purchase.
